Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define MAX_ITERATIONS_RANDOMIZE_LOOP   1000
#define MAX_NAME_STR   120

Referenced by ANN::ANNComponent::generateDefaultName(), and ANN::ANNComponent::generateDefaultWeightsName().

#define MAX_UPDATES_WITHOUT_PRUNE   10000

Referenced by ANN::BiasANNComponent::doUpdate(), and ANN::DotProductANNComponent::doUpdate().

  var 
)    if(!strcmp(name,(var_name)))return (var);

Referenced by ANN::BiasANNComponent::getOption(), ANN::ActivationFunctionANNComponent::getOption(), and ANN::DotProductANNComponent::getOption().

  var 
)    if(!strcmp(name,(var_name))){(var)=value;return;}

#define rnd_weight (   rnd,
  value,
  dinf,
  range,
  weightnearzero 
)
Value:
do { \
unsigned int it = 0; \
do { \
(value) = (rnd)->rand((range))+(dinf); \
it++; \
} while (it < MAX_ITERATIONS_RANDOMIZE_LOOP && \
fabs((value)) < (weightnearzero)); \
if (fabs((value)) < (weightnearzero)) \
ERROR_PRINT("# WARNING!!! Detected weightnearzero\n"); \
} while(false);

Referenced by ANN::Connections::randomizeWeights(), and ANN::Connections::randomizeWeightsAtColumn().
